content: As someone with multiple family members and friend with severe food allergies Nima sounds like a godsend — I look forward to being an early customer. It’s exciting when technology comes together to improve health. The importance of allergens shows how critical it is that we know the true ingredients and source for everything that restaurants serve. The restaurant business has historically been very low tech but adoption of solutions like www.qlinary.com can give exact information on the food we’re eating in restaurants.
